pageContext.claim: “It’s truly incredible that shows like Saturday Night Live, not funny/no talent, can spend all of their time knocking the same person (me), over & over, without so much of a mention of “the other side.” Like an advertisement without consequences. Same with Late Night Shows. Should Federal Election Commission and/or FCC look into this? There must be Collusion with the Democrats and, of course, Russia! Such one sided media coverage, most of it Fake News.”
pageContext.analysis: There is nothing illegal or nefarious about a comedy show making fun of a president. Saturday Night Live has a First Amendment right to skewer the president, as it has done for more than four decades.  Trump assumes comedy shows collude with the Democrats to present one-sided coverage, but those shows have been tough on Democrats when they are in positions of power.
